name: Bhaskara formula
description: Solutions of the quadratic equation ax² + bx + c = 0.

name: Pythagorean theorem
description: In a right triangle, the square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of squares of the legs.

name: Euler's identity
description: Euler's identity links five fundamental constants: e, i, π, 1, and 0.

name: Definition of derivative
description: The derivative of f at x is the limit of the difference quotient.

name: Fundamental theorem of calculus
description: The definite integral equals the difference of the antiderivative at the endpoints.

name: Sum of first n integers
description: Closed form for the sum of the first n positive integers.

name: Euler's formula
description: Relation between the exponential and trigonometric functions.

name: Gaussian integral
description: The Gaussian integral is equal to the square root of π.

name: Law of cosines
description: Generalization of the Pythagorean theorem to any triangle.
